article:
Events and trends

* 1012 BCâAcastus, Archon of Athens, dies after a reign of 36 years and is
  succeeded by his son Archippus. Solar Eclipse seen in Ugarit from 6:09 PM to
  6:39 PM, May 9.
* 1010 BCâUzzah, a citizen of Judah, dies, believed to have been smitten by God
  for violating divine law by touching the Ark of the Covenant.
